input.sentences: the couple went canoeing down the canals in the town 's surrounding lake .
they had a bit of fun zooming through the narrow course .
later they took in the cities view | higher up in an overlooking perch .
the walked and toured the cities architectural landscapes and historical sites .
the couple finally sat down to dinner at a quaint restaurant and enjoyed their meal together .
output.sentences: The people in the boat road down the river.
It was a bumpy, wet, excursion.
The views of the town were wonderful.
A lovely dinner was the perfect way to end the day.
